put.summary: Creates or updates a base field localization.

parameters.name: baseFieldId
parameters.description: The PDC-generated ID of a base field.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The valid IETF language tag for a base field localization

201.description: The new base field localization that was created.

400.description: Required fields were not provided or were incorrectly formatted.

409.description: There was a unique key conflict.
